# onOffSwitchLabelsDidChangeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s On/Off Labels setting changes.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated static let onOffSwitchLabelsDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## On and off labels

- **isOnOffSwitchLabelsEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the On/Off Labels setting is in an enabled state.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the On/Off Labels setting is in an enabled state.
items.name: isOnOffSwitchLabelsEnabled
